plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
☀️ I love sunshine.
🌷 You might find me in a garden.

plant.question: I am a food that grows on trees. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a yellow fruit.
🍌 You peel me before eating.
🌴 I grow in warm places.

plant.question: I am a tree that cries. Not real tears, but a sticky sap. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🥞 You can pour my sap on pancakes.
🌳 I'm a large tree.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you pick me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My petals can be many colors.
🥀 I am often given as a gift.
🌵 I need sunshine.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
👨‍🍳 I am used in cooking.
🥪 I can be white, yellow, or red.

plant.question: I'm tall and have needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me in December. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of evergreen tree.
⭐ You put decorations on my branches.
🎁 Presents are often found under me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a yellow plant.
🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🎬 I am crunchy.

plant.question: I am a plant with a long vine and a big orange fruit inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 People carve faces into me during Halloween.
🥧 You can make a pie from me.
🧡 I'm very round.

plant.question: I am a small green plant that grows on rocks and trees, and I only need a little bit of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ I am often found in forests.
🌿 I'm very soft and can be used for decorations.
🪨 I need moisture to survive.

plant.question: I am a plant whose seeds are used to make a drink, and I need to be roasted before you can use me. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I give you energy in the morning.
🌎 I am grown in many countries.
☀️ I grow on a bush.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I like to hide when I am scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not very fast.
🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥗 I sometimes eat garden plants.

ocean.question: I am big and gray and spout water from my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal that lives in the ocean.
💦 I breathe through a blowhole.
🎶 I sing songs to my family.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squeeze into tiny spaces, who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 Some species squirt ink.
🖐 I have more than one pair of arms.
💙 I'm very intelligent.

ocean.question: I’m a fish that can be many different colors and often live on reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in warm tropical waters
🌈 I'm very beautiful to look at.
🪸 I live near corals.

ocean.question: I am a very long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I live in the ocean, but I'm not a snake.
🔦 I don't have scales.
🌑 I might hide in caves.

ocean.question: I have pinchers and a hard shell and walk sideways on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I can pinch you!
🚶I do not walk forward easily.
🥣 People sometimes eat me in soup or as seafood.

ocean.question: I'm a creature that looks like a star, but I'm alive. I live in the ocean, attached to rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am shaped like a star.
🖐 I have many arms.
🌊 You can find me in tide pools.

ocean.question: I am a giant current of water flowing like a river in the ocean. I help keep Europe warmer than it would be. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I affect the weather.
➡️ I move water over long distances.
🌊 I'm named after a body of water.

ocean.question: I am a tiny animal that lives in a shell. Many of us together build coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I live in colonies.
🧱 I create structures underwater.
🌺 I'm related to anemones.

ocean.question: I am a zone in the ocean where no sunlight reaches, and very strange creatures live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 There is no light here.
👽 Some animals here glow.
🕳️ It is very deep.
